name: Jak and Poi: a new twist on Rock, Paper, Scissors
blurb: As a kid, did you ever play a dinosaur, super hero or robot to try and win at Rock, Paper, Scissors? Jak and Poi is that game and more.
ksr_blurb: <p><i>Jak and Poi </i>is an iOS game that takes old-school rock, paper, scissors and mixes in a few dinosaurs, superheroes, and you know, things that crush. Rewards include copies of the game, as well as physical trading cards so you can go from mobile to social!</p>

rewards.reward: COMMON PLEDGE LEVEL 1 \u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\r\n\r\nEvery backer is important to us, so even at this level you can shape the outcome of the game. You get the right to vote for what cards make it into the game. Add to that our heart-felt thanks and access to the backers-only blog.
COMMON PLEDGE LEVEL 2 \u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\r\n\r\nAll of the above, plus the digital download of the game's OST composed by Josh Whelchel.

COMMON PLEDGE LEVEL 3 \u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\r\n\r\nAll of the above, plus a digital download of the high resolution images for all the cards in the game, suitable for printing. (Note: download does not include the ULTRA-RARE-KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE CARDS mentioned in Uncommon Pledge Level 3)

UNCOMMON PLEDGE LEVEL 1 ––––––––––

By upgrading to the Uncommon Pledge Level, you gain access to tangible rewards!

At this level, you will receive all of the Common Pledge Level rewards plus your choice of the two 50-card starter decks offered exclusively to Kickstater backers. 

All cards will be printed on high grade trading card board, and coated, ensuring collector's value.

(U.S. Shipping included. Not available outside the U.S.)

UNCOMMON PLEDGE LEVEL 2 ––––––––––

Receive all Common Pledge Level Rewards plus two (2) starter decks (one of each version). Perfect for playing with a friend.

(U.S. Shipping included. Not available outside the U.S..)

UNCOMMON PLEDGE LEVEL 3 ––––––––––

Receive all Common Pledge Level Rewards plus four (4) starter decks (two of each version). If you think playing with two decks was fun, try playing with two complete ones.

You also get a full set (4 cards in total) of ULTRA-RARE-KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE-CARDS guaranteed to swing any game in your favor.

(U.S. Shipping included. Not available outside the U.S.)

UNCOMMON PLEDGE LEVEL 4 ––––––––––

Receive all Uncommon Pledge Level 3 Rewards, plus you get to design a card together with us! Your signature will be digitally signed on your card, giving you, quite literally, a permanent mark on the game. Additionally, you are mentioned as a Designer in the credits of the game.

(U.S. Shipping included. Not available outside the U.S.)

RARE PLEDGE LEVEL 1 ––––––––––

Receive the Uncommon Pledge Level 4 rewards, plus a custom hand-painted 45x60 cm oil painting with your choice of card art. The quality and collector's value of one of these paintings has to be seen to be believed. (Scroll down through the project details to see more about the paintings.)

Your mention in the credits will also be upgraded to Associate Producer.

(International backers rejoice! Worldwide shipping included.)

RARE PLEDGE LEVEL 2 ––––––––––

Receive Rare Pledge Level 1, and have your custom hand-painted poster upgraded to 60x80cm and your title changed to Producer!

(Worldwide shipping included!)

RARE PLEDGE LEVEL 3 \u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013 Receive Rare Pledge Level 2 plus an additional 60x80cm painting and you will be given Senior Producer credit in the game. Best of all, cards you receive will be upgraded to Ultra Rare GOLD-BORDERED cards.  This pledge level is for serious collectors only.\r\n\r\n(Worldwide shipping included!)

ULTRA RARE PLEDGE LEVEL \u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013 Receive Rare Pledge Level 3 and Executive Producer credit in the game. Have your name/signature or logo appear in a splash screen before the main menu of the game. This screen will be in the game permanently, as such is a great way to publicize yourself or your company.\r\n\r\n(Worldwide shipping included!)

UNIQUE PLEDGE LEVEL \u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013\u2013 You're probably a long-lost and extremely wealthy relative to love us this much. As such, we shall give you the king's treatment and offer you an upgrade to the Ultra Rare Pledge Level, devoting an entire splash screen just for you and giving you the title of Partner. On top of which, the first expansion of Jak and Poi will be named after and dedicated to you! If travel documents permit, not only will shipping be included, we shall hand-deliver your rewards ourselves!
